title: Cat. 93  Pitcher, 1947/56
publication_title: American Silver in the Art Institute of Chicago
content:
<section class="osci-tk-epub-section tombstone" id="tombstone">Design attributed to Oscar Riedener (American, born Switzerland, 1910–2000)  
Tiffany & Co. (American, founded 1837)  
New York, New York  
Silver; 28.3 × 20.3 × 14 cm (11 1/8 × 8 × 5 1/2 in.)  
The Art Institute of Chicago, the Orbit Fund, 1999.292

</section><section class="osci-tk-epub-section curatorial_entry" id="curatorial_entry">On bottom (fig. 93.1)

</section><section class="osci-tk-epub-section provenance" id="provenance">With unknown galley, Munich, by c. 1975.

Sold to private collector, IN, c. 1975–c. 1999.

With Historical Design, Inc., New York, by 1999.

Sold to the Art Institute of Chicago, 1999.

</section><section class="osci-tk-epub-section references" id="references">Downs (2001), pp. 88–89, cat. 25 (ill.).

Loring (2001), p. 247 (ill.).

Barter et al. (2009a), pp. 336–37, cat. 172 (ill.).

</section><section id="figures">Pitcher, 1947/56.

fig. 93.1 </section>
